question:
####[UFAQ 24](https://ancur.wikia.com/wiki/Reign_and_Reverie_UFAQ) [Michael Boggs]
Can the Runner prevent the Eavesdrop trace with [Hunting Grounds](/en/card/09035)?
answer: No. Hunting Grounds prevents "when encountered" abilities on ice, and the trace ability from Eavesdrop is on a condition counter.
